### Visual Clues

#### Synopsis
The choices given in Qualtrics can seem daunting in one instance but limited in another. In fact its not a matter of having too many choices, rather in identifying which components within the software will yield the greatest return on response rates. These little short walkthroughs will help you to locate specific functions that go beyond the design aspect into fucntionality.
